name: bitbucket.org -- Dark Theme
description: Dark theme for bitbucket.org Version: 0.10 This style brings bitbucket to the dark side. This is a test version. So there are many elements not yet converted. Also, some gradients assumed to be used in firefox. Not tested on other browsers.
obsoletion_message: Deleted by admin - contains non-loading images
additional_info:
Changes:

-- Need to fix so many bugs! Or better rewrite at all

-- Restored original font-family.

v0.8:
